citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, expired bottles of Albon (sulfadimethoxine) (expired December 2024) and tetanus antitoxin
(expired November 20, 2018) were found stored in the drug refrigerator and have been administered past their expiration
date. Use of expired medications does not constitute the standard of care as they may not be safe or effective, although
there was no evidence of adverse effects following administration of these medications. The facility must ensure that
medications are properly disposed of before the expiration date is reached. Correct by June 18, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
At the time of inspection, expired bottles of Albon (sulfadimethoxine) (expired December 2024) and tetanus antitoxin 
(expired November 20, 2018) were found stored in the drug refrigerator and have been administered past their expiration 
date. Use of expired medications does not constitute the standard of care as they may not be safe or effective, although 
there was no evidence of adverse effects following administration of these medications. The facility must ensure that 
medications are properly disposed of before the expiration date is reached. Correct by June 18, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
